favorites.title: Jussie Smollett scheduled to be sentenced for lying to police in hate crime hoax - CNN
favorites.author: Brad Parks, Omar Jimenez and Jason Hanna, CNN
favorites.description: Former "Empire" actor Jussie Smollett is scheduled to be sentenced in a Chicago court Thursday for falsely reporting to police that he was the victim of a hate crime -- though his attorneys will first try to persuade a judge to set aside the guilty verdict.

favorites.title: Microsoft details its Steam Deck support for Xbox Game Studios titles - The Verge
favorites.author: Tom Warren
favorites.description: Microsoft is supporting Steam Deck with most of its Xbox Game Studios titles. Halo, Gears 5, and Microsoft Flight Simulator won’t be supported on Steam Deck, though.
favorites.content:
Halo, Gears 5, and Microsoft Flight Simulator arent supported
Microsoft is providing an update on its support for Valves Steam Deck today. Most Xbox Game Studios titles will run on the Steam Deck, b… [+1582 chars]
